title: Through Making House Calls, Doctor Sees 'Underbelly Of Medicine'
teaser: NPR's Robert Siegel joins Dr. Ernest Brown, a primary care physician who only practices by house call, as he makes his rounds in Washington, D.C. He says it's a mistake to put a price tag on medicine.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
